title: Dashboard Overview
lede: Learn how to navigate the iMash dashboard and understand key features and metrics.

sections.title: Dashboard Components
sections.content:
The iMash dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of your AI voice platform activities.

Key Sections:

  • Agent Performance: View metrics for all your AI agents
  • Call Statistics: Monitor call volume and success rates
  • Recent Activity: Track latest calls and agent interactions
  • Quick Actions: Access frequently used features

images.caption: The main dashboard showing key metrics and recent activity
The main dashboard showing key metrics and recent activity

metaTitle: Dashboard Overview - Navigate iMash Platform Features
metaDescription: Explore the iMash dashboard interface. Learn about agents, phone system, campaigns, CRM, analytics, and settings navigation.
metaKeywords: dashboard, platform overview, navigation, user interface, control panel, iMash features, admin panel
